review: Easy to set up and use, and easily the best way to view my laptop display on my TV.  There is a nearly two-second lag, which is to be expected but not really a problem for most applications.  You definitely couldn't use this for gaming or anything involving heavy typing or mouse / trackpad use.
author: J. Jackson "JJ"

review: Chromecast is fantastic.  I use my IPhone to control it.  I have Netflix, Hulu Plus, HBO Now, and Sling TV.  I haven't been able to get the Sling TV to work yet, but all the others work well.  We got rid of our $200 a month Direct TV bill.  Without a working Sling TV app, we are still missing some of the shows we like, but we are having more conversations.  The pictures that are displayed when no show is on make the TV look like an ever-changing work-of-art.
author: Woodrow
